title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux with build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items as well as the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) below the label starts moving down. This behavior can confuse users.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux with build 20011127.
2. Open a view, such as the Navigator.
3. Resize the view to a smaller size.
4. Observe that the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon, move below the label.
